subProjections.name: Extend
subProjections.description: Extend the memory backed by this DataFrame with the values from other.

subProjections.name: Clear
subProjections.description: Create an n-row null-filled (n%>0) copy of the DataFrame.
subProjections.projection: creating a null-filled copy with <%numRows%> rows

subProjections.name: Clone
subProjections.description: Create a copy of this DataFrame.

subProjections.name: Fill null with value
subProjections.description: Fill replace null with a specified value.

subProjections.name: Fill null with value
subProjections.description: Replace nulls with a specified value.

subProjections.name: Fill null with strategy
subProjections.description: Replace null based on a strategy.
